## ForeignRelation interface

Represents a foreign relationship on TModel in TState

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ForeignRelation<TState, TModel extends StateModels<TState>, TForeignProp extends ValidModelForeignProperties<TState, TModel>> extends StateRelation<TState> 
```
